      • loadOverviewPage

        public static OverviewPage loadOverviewPage(StructElement structElement,
                                            java.util.Locale locale)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                            IndexUnreachableException,
                                            PresentationException,
                                            DAOException,
                                            ViewerConfigurationException
        Loads the overview page for the given StructElement. The object the client receives is a copy of the object returned from the database. Each user session receives a separate copy of the page so that not everyone works on the same object.
        Parameters:
        structElement -
        locale -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PresentationException
        IndexUnreachableException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        DAOException
        ViewerConfigurationException
